Question: Michael Caton-Jones, from Time Out, described this person in the film as "at his frenetic best".
Hints: This person married actress Tracy Pollan on July 16, 1988, at West Mountain Inn in Arlington, Vermont.
This person's family lived in various cities and towns across Canada because of his father's career.
Zemeckis quickly replaced Stoltz with this person whose schedule was now more open with the return of Meredith Baxter.
